data.text: @drkevinedward One thing I might add, I have known many a female who are as crude as males with there ego minds. An ex lover once said to me on the phone. "I am going out to get drunk tonight & find some big cock to suck." Then she said, "Oh, I am sorry, I forgot I was talking to a man."

@ToFertileGround Yes. I understand. I my experience, I enjoyed the contrasting beauty of females and being in their presence. Growing up in sports, being around crude guys most of the time, it was very refreshing to have a girl around now and then.

@drkevinedward I was late bloomer with females. As teen, girls would say, "What's wrong with you?" I didn't have goals, making out petting were over powering my presence. Most guys I grew up with in the popular athlete/cheerleader click, had one track minds, saying crude things I'd never would.
